name: 賴建宏
objective: 本課程將從基礎深度學習理論、邊緣智慧硬體應用、資料集建置、客製化模型訓練到推論環境佈署，讓學員透過 Google Colab, OpenCV, Tensorflow/Keras 等開源工具，學習如何規畫及實踐不同類型的低功耗、低延時、低成本及高隱私的邊緣智慧應用專案。
schedule: This course will cover basic deep learning theory, edge smart hardware applications, data set construction, customized model training, and inference environment deployment. Students will learn how to plan through open source tools such as Google Colab, OpenCV, and Tensorflow/Keras. Draw and practice different types of edge intelligence application projects with low power consumption, low latency, low cost and high privacy.

課程對應SDGs指標: SDG8：尊嚴就業與經濟發展（Decent Work and Economic Growth）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）
課程是否導入AI: AI1：使用生成式 AI 作為教學過程的輔助工具（Use generative AI tools as an aid to the teaching process）AI2：鼓勵學生使用生成式 AI 工具（Encourage students to use generative AI tools）AI3：使用生成式 AI 進行課堂即時互動（Use generative AI for real-time classroom interaction）AI4：簡單介紹 AI 的基本概念（Briefly introduce the basic concept of AI）AI5：深入探討 AI 的原理與應用（Explore the principles and applications of AI in depth）
